label: 類聚国史
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 2:  Heian Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1999
説明文: A historical work by Sugawara no Michizane, begun at the command of Emperor Uda and presented to the throne in 892, in which the contents of the Six National Histories are rearranged by topic (p. 378). [菅原道真、宇多天皇、六国史]
